title: TouristGopher Combines Bayesian Rankings from Google Yelp and FourSquare
author: octohedron
content: readme.md touristgopher gopher knows it action touristgopher.com clever gopher combines search delicious food results yelp, google places foursquare their bayesian ranking estimates puts on maptry outinstall redisinstall dependencies$ getset environment variables$ export gmaps_key=your_gmaps_keyrun $ go build && nohup ./touristgopher & check other repo, touristfriendcontributing: yeslicense: mit
